Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Madison
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Madison.

Allow extra travel time.
